title: Replace hero background with uploaded image (no adjustments)

requirements.text: Replace the landing page Hero section background image with the newly uploaded file `myplace-hero2.jpeg`, used exactly as-is.

quotes: please use this other image (file attached) for the main hero section, the previous one is not good.

acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx` uses `myplace-hero2.jpeg` as the hero background image source.
The new hero image file is included as a static asset under `frontend/public/assets/` (or the project’s existing public assets location) so it loads in production builds.

No additional visual adjustments are applied to the uploaded image (no overlays/gradients, darkening filters, tint layers, or cropping edits performed outside the existing `object-cover object-center` rendering).
Hero section height and layout remain unchanged (e.g., still `min-h-screen`, same content positioning and spacing).

constraints: Do not edit files in `frontend/src/components/ui` or other immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Keep the Hero section layout/height unchanged; only swap the background image and remove any non-image overlays that would alter its appearance.
nonGoals: Do not change hero headline/subheadline copy or button behavior.
Do not change other landing page sections (Features, About, Contact, Schedule, Footer).
Do not introduce new backend logic or schema changes.
